dreams-listed-here: Your dreams will be listed here
most-frequent-words: The most frequent words in your dreams
insights-listed-here: Insights from your dreams will appear here
only-you-can-see: Only you can see this dream
confirm-comment-deletion: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
no-comments: When someone comments on one of your dreams or saves it, a notification will appear here.
no-saved: The dreams you save (by clicking on the ‚≠ê) will be listed here.
delete-account-description: By deleting your account, all content associated with it will be removed, and it will not be possible to recover it.
confirm-account-deletion: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
ai-settings-description: By checking this checkbox you allow the Eu tive um sonho staff to review comments generated by Sonia, which might contain information from your private dreams. By checking this checkbox you also help us improve the technologies powering Sonia.
ai-settings-short-description: Allow humans to review Sonia's comments on your private dreams
ai-settings-update-error: There was an error updating your Sonia settings. Please try again later.
